abstract: Penn State settles with six more victims or accusers of former assistant coach Jerry Sandusky, reportedly bringing university’s total payout in child sex abuse scandal to almost $93 million.
lead_paragraph: Penn State settled with six more victims or accusers of the former assistant coach Jerry Sandusky, according to a new audit that puts the university’s total payout in the child sex abuse scandal at nearly $93 million.

headline.main: Penn State Settles With More Victims

snippet: Penn State settled with six more victims or accusers of the former assistant coach Jerry Sandusky, according to a new audit that puts the university’s total payout in the child sex abuse scandal at nearly $93 million.
